ti

Class Batch

  • java.lang.Object
    • ti.Batch

  • public class Batch
extends Object
    This class contains the logic to run the retrieval process of the search engine in batch mode.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DocumentProcessor docProcessor 
      protected Index index 
      protected RetrievalModel model 
      protected File pathToQueries 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Batch(File pathToQueries, RetrievalModel model, Index index, DocumentProcessor docProcessor)
      Creates a new batch retriever for the queries in the specified path and using the given model.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void printResults(ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> results, String queryId)
      Prints the results in TREC format to System.out.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Batch

        public Batch(File pathToQueries,
     RetrievalModel model,
     Index index,
     DocumentProcessor docProcessor)
        Creates a new batch retriever for the queries in the specified path and using the given model.
        Parameters:
        pathToQueries - the path to the file with queries.
        model - the retrieval model to run queries.
        index - the index.
        docProcessor - the processor to extract query terms.

    • Method Detail

      • readQueries

        protected static ArrayList<Tuple<String,String>> readQueries(File pathToQueries)
                                                      throws Exception
        Reads the queries in the specified file path.
        Parameters:
        pathToQueries - the path to the file.
        Returns:
        a list of Tuples where the first item is the queryID and the second one is the query text.
        Throws:
        Exception - in an error occurs while reading the file.

      • run

        public void run()
         throws Exception
        Runs the batch retrieval process. For each query, it prints the results to System.out in TREC format.
        Throws:
        Exception - in an error occurs during the process.

      • printResults

        protected void printResults(ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> results,
                String queryId)
        Prints the results in TREC format to System.out.
        Parameters:
        results - the retrieval results. A list of Tuples where the first item is the docID and the second one is the similarty score.
        queryId - the queryID to print in the results.
